title: Soudal Quick-Step Riders, Staffers Lament Possible Closure of the ‘Wolfpack’
content:
The prolific Belgian franchise and its racing legacy could be shuttered if the 'mega merger' with Jumbo-Visma moves forward: 'It would be a shame for cycling.'

Read the full article at Soudal Quick-Step Riders, Staffers Lament Possible Closure of the ‘Wolfpack’ on Velo.
author: ahood
